an9.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an9.1:2.2: ‘sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ka upanisa bhavanaya’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam kinti byakareyyatha”ti?
an9.1:2.3: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma …pe… bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an9.1:3.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha; bhasissami”ti.
an9.1:3.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an9.1:4.2: ‘sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ka upanisa bhavanaya’ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
an9.1:5.2: Sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ayam pathama upanisa bhavanaya.
an9.1:6.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an9.1:6.2: Sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ayam dutiya upanisa bhavanaya.
an9.1:7.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an9.1:7.2: Sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ayam tatiya upanisa bhavanaya.
an9.1:8.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an9.1:8.2: Sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ayam catutthi upanisa bhavanaya.
an9.1:9.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an9.1:9.2: Sambodhipakkhikanam, avuso, dhammanam ayam pancami upanisa bhavanaya’.
an9.1:10.1: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa—
an9.1:10.2: silava bhavissati, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharissati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhissati sikkhapadesu.
an9.1:11.1: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa—
an9.1:11.2: yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an9.1:12.1: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa—
an9.1:12.2: araddhaviriyo viharissati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an9.1:13.1: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa—
an9.1:13.2: pannava bhavissati udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an9.1:14.1: Tena ca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuna imesu pancasu dhammesu patitthaya cattaro dhamma uttari bhavetabba—
an9.1:14.2: asubha bhavetabba ragassa pahanaya, metta bhavetabba byapadassa pahanaya, anapanassati bhavetabba vitakkupacchedaya, aniccasanna bhavetabba asmimanasamugghataya.
an9.1:14.4: Anattasanni asmimanasamugghatam papunati dittheva dhamme nibbanan”ti.
